fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Staff of Homa, Wavebreaker's Fin (R5 recommended), The Catch (R5), Primordial Jade Winged-Spear

fields.name: Note:
fields.value: Raiden cannot really afford to use any artifact set other than 4 piece Emblem of Severed Fate as it is so far ahead of any competition. It is highly recommended that you farm that set for Raiden if you intend to build her.
